name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 2: The Shougi
overview: Shogi, also known as Japanese chess, is a two-player board game in the same family as Western chess, chaturanga, and Chinese Xiangqi, and is the most popular of a family of chess variants native to Japan. Shogi means general's Simple 1500 Series vol. 2 - The Shogi is a shogi game supervised by the president of teh Computer Shogi Association, that features 3 difficulty levels and also a 2 players vs mode.
